letters.description: Assess the client's unique physical constitution, temperament, and comprehensive health history.
Identify underlying biochemical imbalances, environmental stressors, and lifestyle triggers.
Design a customized wellness plan utilizing botanical medicine, clinical nutrition, and natural modalities.
Implement detoxification and elimination strategies to remove physiological obstacles to healing.
Replenish vital nutrients and support the body's homeostatic mechanisms to regain physiological harmony.
Educate the client on sustainable self-care practices to maintain long-term vitality and prevent future illness.
